meanings.sent1: The old door was gnarring loudly in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The rusty gate was gnarring as it swung back and forth.
meanings.sent3: The gnarring of the car engine made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The gnarring of the gears signaled trouble ahead.
meanings.sent5: The gnarring sound of the chalk on the blackboard was unbearable.

meanings.definition: To grind or gnash the teeth in anger or frustration.
meanings.sent1: She was gnarring her teeth in annoyance during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: He couldn't help gnarring his teeth when he heard the news.
meanings.sent3: The toddler started gnarring his teeth when he couldn't get his toy.
meanings.sent4: The angry cat was gnarring its teeth at the dog outside.
meanings.sent5: The sound of gnarring teeth echoed through the room in frustration.
